item.title: First Post
item.description: This is a test of creating posts on Hugo. I have my content organized with a posts directory and Hugo range function to list posts on my index page. I may add posts to my live site detailing tutorials and professional insights. For the time being I’d like to primarily focus on improving the HTML/CSS and look of the site before adding large content changes. I’m undecided on whether or not to add mobile support; I imagine most viewers of my website will be using a desktop/laptop.
